**Notice of Tender Closing**

In accordance with the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat’s Directive on Government Contracts, a non-mandatory site visit is scheduled for December 7, 2022, at 10:00 AM EDT. Firms interested in providing services for the Fire Alarm Replacement project at the Forward Operating Location (FOL) Iqaluit are invited to submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the tender closing date.

**Compliance with Inuit Preference Policy**

The contracting entity requires that bidders fulfill the Inuit Preference Policy set out in the Solicitation Documents. Prospective bidders must ensure that their companies meet the eligibility criteria specified in the policy.

**Selection Process**

The contracted entity will evaluate the proposals based on the established evaluation criteria. The successful bidder will be selected based on the proposal offering the highest total score.

Please visit the Defence Construction Canada website at [www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca](http://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca) to obtain contract award results and access the Solicitation Documents. Prospective bidders should contact Defence Construction Canada to request additional information regarding the project.
